roleset.name: rise, move forwards
roleset.note: SURGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'surge' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'rise' and all them. (from surge.01-v)
SURGE-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to surge.01-v. Surge-v is a member of VN classes appear-48.1.1 and calibratable_cos-45.6-1. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from surge.01-n)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is surging

example.name: vague end point
example.text: ...when the US currency temporarily surged above the 150 yen level.

example.name: Arg0
example.text: We can surge troops all we want , but if the level of cruelty does n't increase it will all be pointless .

example.name: Args 1 and 2
example.text: Chicago has had a huge surge in their murder rate, after closing down the city projects.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Booming metals prices have fueled Trelleborg 's recent profit surge , raising mining 's share of pretax profit to 68 % this year from a big loss two years earlier .
